neutral: ^Should I ask about their diet? Maybe that’s too personal….
yes: ^Hey, Captain. I got an idea for you.
^There’s this big green gator - they stand on their hind legs, wear a purple shirt, and talk! It would make for some good content.
^That would be great! I’m thinking an interview would do.
^Could you find them again and tell them to meet me here?
no: ^Alright. What’s going on, dudes? It’s me, Captain Sparkles. Welcome to… uhm…
^(Oh, he’s recording. Allllright, let’s just go around.)
^Excuse me! Sorry to interrupt you. One of my viewers suggested that I visit this place and film.
^I’m a little lost, though, and I couldn’t find much online about the landmarks.
^Yeah, we don’t leave much of a digital footprint.
^Ah, I’m hoping the video will help out the town with that. I’m sure there’s something good here.
^If you have any ideas, send them my way.
